{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Echo Life HG8010 Optical Network Terminal (ONT) |caption2 = |pp = http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8010/index.htm |sp = |dl = |fandom = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Huawei |model = HG8010 |submodelappend = |submodel = H |revision = v6 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 7 April 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Huawei_HG8010H_v6 |series = |type = ONT, media converter |sernum = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = HG8010XGE03 VER.A |ecc_id = |cpu1chip1 = HiSilicon;SD5117L; |cpu1_cores = |cpu1_type = |cpu1_type_rev = |cpu1spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = |ram1chip = |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Huawei HG8010 is a GPON to Gigabit Ethernet media converter. :The SoC seems to be an [http://www.hisilicon.com/products/digital.html HiSilicon] SD5117L, here is the PCB. {{SCollapse|Description: |
The EchoLife HG8010H is an indoor optical network terminal (ONT) in Huawei FTTH solution. 
By using the EPON technology, ultra-broadband access is provided for home and SOHO users. 

The HG8010H provides one GE/FE auto-adapting Ethernet port. The HG8010 features high-performance 
forwarding capabilities to ensure excellent experience with VoIP, Internet and HD video services. 

Plug-and-play: services can be deployed by one click on the NMS, and on-site configuration is not required.
Remote diagnosis: Remote fault locating is implemented by the loop-line test of POTS ports, 
 call emulation and PPPoE dialup emulation initiated by the NMS.
Link monitoring: E2E link detection is achieved using 802.1ag Ethernet OAM.
High speed forwarding: 900 Mbit/s forwarding in the NAT scenario.
IPv6 Capability: support IPv6/IPv4 dual stack and DS-Lite.
Applications: Data services, Voice services, Video services, 
 Monitoring service, FTTH / FTTB / FTTO / FTTP

Key Features:
Plug and play: Configurations are automatically delivered by the Network Management System 
 so on-site commissioning is not required
Remote diagnosis: POTS ports support loop line tests and call simulation tests, implementing remote 
fault locating. Supports remote batch upgrades, and up to 2,000 devices can be upgraded each hour
Link monitoring: 802.1ag-based Ethernet OAM that implements end-to-end (E2E) link detection and network isolation
Energy wise: SOC chips feature high-integration capabilities. 
Each chip integrates the PON, voice, gateway, and LSW modules, with 25 percent power savings

Performance Specification:
Fiber port: 1x EPON interface, SC single-mode/single-fiber, 
 Downstream rate 1.25Gbps, Upstream rate 1.25Gbps
Wavelength: Tx 1310nm, Rx 1490nm
Fiber interface: SC/PC
RX sensitivity: <-28dBm (1490nm)
LAN: 1*10/100/1000Mbps adaptive Ethernet ports, 
 full/half duplex, RJ45 interface
Throughput: Throughput can reach 900Mbps or more
DC power: 12V 1A, external AC-DC power adapter
Button: Reset, power
Power: ≤8W
Working temperature: -5-+55℃  working humidity:10-90%(non-condensation)
Storage temperature: -30℃-+60℃ storage humidity: 10-90%(non-condensation)
Dimension: 115*94*27mm (length*width*height)
Net weight: ≤0.2Kg
}} ==See also== *[[Huawei HG861]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg861/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 1x CATV *[[Huawei HG863]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg863/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 4x GbE LAN *[[Huawei HG8010]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8010/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 1x GbE LAN *[[Huawei HG8010H v1]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8010/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 1x GbE LAN *[[Huawei HG8010H v6]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8010/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 1x GbE LAN *[[Huawei HG8110]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8110/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 1x POTS (VoIP), 1x GbE LAN *[[Huawei HG8240]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8240/index.htm PPage] :EchoLife HG8240 EPON Terminal (PX20+) • [http://blog.ich8.com/post/5862 '''ich8''' blog] *[[Huawei HG8242]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8242/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 2x POTS, 4x GbE LAN, 1x CATV *[[Huawei HG8245]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8245/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 2x POTS, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0; 1T1R Wi-Fi :[[Huawei HG8245H]] • [[Huawei HG8245Q]] • [[Huawei HG8245GTH]] *[[Huawei HG8247]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8247/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 2x POTS, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0, 1x CATV; 1T1R Wi-Fi *[[Huawei HG8447]] - EchoLife GPON ONT • [http://www1.huawei.com/en/products/fixed-access/fttx/ont/hg8447/index.htm PPage] :Ports: 4x POTS, 4x GbE LAN, 1x USB 2.0, 1x CATV; 1T1R Wi-Fi [[Category:English Documentation]]
